tool_description: API to scrape Google trends without limit geting blocked!
name: Trendly
title: Trendly

api_list.name: top realtime search
api_list.description: get the top realtime trending searches in google in trends
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trendly.p.rapidapi.com/realtime"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trendly.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: suggest
api_list.description: provide a keyword and get suggestions for related  keywords

api_list.name: interest by region
api_list.description: Get the interest by region as in the Google trends search. this route will be from the same page of the interest over time search when providing the same parameters .

api_list.name: interest over time
